item.title: How do i make my server not lag
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Not to state the obvious, but why did you go to Client Help when you are asking a question about your server? To answer your question: not sure what Pbscape is, but it is probably poorly programmed.

What causes lag?
-public void process() { filled with unnecessary tasks.
-Large arrays that use no where near the amount of memory that is opened for them.
-500ms ticks. 600ms ticks are said to be more efficient (makes a difference overall).
-Long block statements that do unnecessary checks, and that can be shortened down (enough of them can cause a problem).
-Player updating is probably the most constantly updated part of a server, if this is done badly it cause major side effects (every player is being updated/iterated through every half a second or so).
-Poor computer or host specs (get rid of unnecessary processes etc.).
???

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my server not lag
